mapper.insert: insert into member_table (m_id, m_password, m_name, m_email, m_phone, m_photoname) values (#{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_name}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone}, #{m_photoname})
mapper.select: select m_id from member_table where m_id = #{m_id}
select * from member_table where m_id = #{m_id} and m_password = #{m_password}
